content: create a touch of highland charm with this elegant scottish thistle motif perfect for embellishing scarves shawls bags and more this pattern can be created using a variety of yarn types and hook sizes which will affect the size of the motif the yarn and hook sized used created a motif that is 4 5 inches tall and 3 inches wide the cover photo contains an image of the completed motif attached to the end of a shawl made using the bernie scarf trio pattern by toni lipsey
